TEXT.S: Bud Acton nalecuhan i Troy, Michigan, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Bud Acton i 1985 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 40, namapili' tu nu Dallas Mavericks putiput putiput. tatama, nalecuhan ciniza i 1942 a mihcan1 a bulad 11 a demiad.
